update t_mkt_activity
mkt_activity_id = #{record.mktActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sys_company_id = #{record.sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sys_brand_id = #{record.sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mbr_group_def_id = #{record.mbrGroupDefId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mkt_activity_smart_group_id = #{record.mktActivitySmartGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

activity_status = #{record.activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

store_limit_type = #{record.storeLimitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_user_name = #{record.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_user_id = #{record.modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modified_user_name = #{record.modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_date = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid = #{record.valid,jdbcType=BIT},

activity_detail_img = #{record.activityDetailImg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
store_limit_list = #{record.storeLimitList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update t_mkt_activity set sys_company_id = #{sysCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sys_brand_id = #{sysBrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mbr_group_def_id = #{mbrGroupDefId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mkt_activity_smart_group_id = #{mktActivitySmartGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, activity_code = #{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, long_term = #{longTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_immediately = #{sendImmediately,jdbcType=BIT}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qr_code_url = #{qrCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_status = #{activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_store_limit = #{isStoreLimit,jdbcType=BIT}, store_limit_type = #{storeLimitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prize_points = #{prizePoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modified_user_name = #{modifiedUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT} where mkt_activity_id = #{mktActivityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.mkt_activity_id AS mktActivityId, t.activity_name AS activityName, t.long_term AS longTerm, t.start_time AS startTime, t.end_time AS endTime, t.activity_code AS activityCode, t.sys_brand_id AS sysBrandId, t.activity_type AS activityType, t.create_date AS createDate, t.activity_status AS activityStatus, a.member_count AS participateNumber, a.points_sum AS pointsSum, a.order_amount_sum AS orderAmountSum FROM t_mkt_activity t JOIN t_mkt_activity_count a ON a.mkt_activity_id = t.mkt_activity_id WHERE t.valid=1
AND t.sys_brand_id = #{sysBrandId}
AND t.activity_type = #{activityType}
and t.create_date >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and t.create_date <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND t.activity_name LIKE "%"#{activityName}"%"
AND t.activity_code LIKE "%"#{activityCode}"%"
AND t.activity_type IN (3,4)

SELECT group_concat(tmcon.store_limit_list) AS storeLimitList FROM t_mkt_activity tmt
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_register tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_upgrade tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_manual tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_order tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_signin tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_birthday tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_evaluation tmcon
INNER JOIN t_mkt_activity_vip_aniversary tmcon
ON tmt.mkt_activity_id =tmcon.mkt_activity_id AND tmcon.valid=1 AND is_store_limit=1 AND store_limit_type=2
WHERE tmt.valid=1
AND tmcon.mbr_level_code=#{mbrLevelCode}
AND tmt.sys_brand_id=#{sysbrandId} AND tmt.activity_type=#{activityType} AND tmt.start_time <=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.end_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.check_status <> 4 AND (tmt.activity_status=1 OR tmt.activity_status=2)

SELECT group_concat(tmt.store_limit_list) AS storeLimitList FROM t_mkt_activity tmt WHERE tmt.valid=1 AND tmt.is_store_limit=1 AND tmt.store_limit_type=2 AND tmt.sys_brand_id=#{sysbrandId} AND tmt.activity_type=#{activityType} AND tmt.start_time <=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.end_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND tmt.check_status <> 4 AND (tmt.activity_status=1 OR tmt.activity_status=2)
